title: Handwritten script font
content:
[![Image and video hosting by TinyPic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174341im_/http:/i43.tinypic.com/2i8er0w.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174341/http:/tinypic.com/?ref=2i8er0w)

Would love to know the name of this font! Have searched all the places I normally look (Da Font, Font Squirrel, Identifont, MyFont image identifier thingo) and have had no luck. Have found similar fonts, but there would be one character that was different.

Hoping someone here might recognise the font. Sorry the sample is so small

Font: 

 Wendy LP 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174341/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: amykaren

comments.content: It is **[Wendy LP (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174341/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Wendy%20LP%20-%20Medium&fid=9e789357af909f656664096723771931&fsize=60&text=Join%20us%20to%20celebrate%201st%20birthday!&wrap=2)** by Garrett Boge (1997), available from Adobe & Letter Perfect
